The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Fridday 

Cream Lentil Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (celery, tomato, red lentils, carrot, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Black Rice with Vegetables and Mushrooms – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g  (black rice, zucchini, carrot, champinion mushrooms, red bell pepper, celery, curcuma, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Corn & Red Bell Pepper Crackers Bread- raw / gluten free / 40 g (corn, red bell pepper, quinoa, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chocolate Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (cashew, almonds, dates, fresh cocoa powder, alkaline cocoa, unfiltered honey)
